import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Breadcrumb, BreadcrumbItem, Button, Label, Col, Row } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Control, Form, Errors, actions } from 'react-redux-form'; const required = (val) => val && val.length; const maxLength = (len) => (val) => !(val) || (val.length <= len); const minLength = (len) => (val) => (val) && (val.length >= len); const isNumber = (val) => !isNaN(Number(val)); const validEmail = (val) => /^\w+([.-]?\w+)*@\w+([.-]?\w+)*(\.\w{2,3})+$/i.test(val); class Contact extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.handleSubmit = this.handleSubmit.bind(this); } handleSubmit(values) { this.props.postFeedback(values); this.props.resetFeedbackForm(); } render() { return(

); } } export default Contact;
